A solid and enduring quality title. Despite a significant learning curve, the basics are familiar to anyone who's played an FPS. With tons of community content and plenty of game servers online, there's never a lack of places to play or people to play with. The cosmetic customization options let you put your own spin on your inventory, a real plus for those who enjoy that sort of thing. It also allows others to market their acquisitions to buy other Steam content, so it's a win - win, even if skins aren't your jam.
